Text: Boston Globe Article Cc Peggy Mahoney asked me to forward this to you FYI Here is a link to the Boston Globe article I have discussed with most of you After numerous conversations and plenty of information proving otherwise the reporter unfortunately decided to do this article based upon recent happenings It is clearly a cheap shot On a happier note here is a good article about our relationship with Quaker Oats in the Chicago SunTimes Thanks Peggy
